titles.plays: Number of times to play the animation
titles.loopWait: Time to wait between each play
titles.flipTrip: Flip to mirror image for return trip
titles.tripWait: Time to wait before commencing return trip
titles.save: Save current settings as a named Easy
titles.preset: Revert to original preset, discarding all previous changes
titles.data: Copy animation data as a tab-delimited table, for pasting into a spreadsheet
titles.code: Copy object(s) as plain text JavaScript code
titles.time: The duration of a one-way play
titles.direction: Up or Down, from 0 to 1000 or from 1000 to 0
titles.type: The primary shaper of the timing curve(s)
titles.io: IO: the permutations of in and out, here it determines if the animation has one or two legs
titles.lockSplit: Lock split: maintain or scale value when Duration changes
titles.lockGap: Lock gap: maintain or scale value when Duration changes
titles.color0: Color of top-left corner of gradient
titles.color1: Color of bottom-right corner of gradient
titles.share: Copy link to clipboard, including all current settings
